The type safety proofs in minidot are based on Type Safety in Three Easy Lemmas by Jeremy Siek.

nat : type. z : nat. s : nat -> nat.
plus : nat -> nat -> nat -> type. plus/z : plus z N N. plus/s : plus N1 N2 N3 -> plus (s N1) N2 (s N3).
